title: Be Still My Soul
description: A contemplative setting that weaves the familiar hymn tune through rich harmonic textures, building from gentle meditation to confident affirmation.
ideal_for: General worship, memorial services, concert programming

title: Advent Gloria
description: An accessible yet musically engaging setting perfect for the Advent season, combining lyrical melody with energetic rhythmic sections.

title: The Lord Is My Light
description: Based on Psalm 27, this piece moves from introspective verses to a joyful, full-voiced finale that celebrates divine protection and guidance.
ideal_for: General worship, festival services, concert programming

title: Christmas Carol Medley
description: A festive arrangement combining three beloved carols with fresh harmonies and engaging rhythmic variations.

title: John the Baptist
description: A powerful setting exploring themes of preparation and prophecy, building from solo voice to full choir.
ideal_for: Advent services, baptism services, general worship
